entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 1:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
